there's cube Tesla which continuously

namespace defaults which creates default

and deploy target combination gets its

the ammo from config kubernetes
environment in each services repo this

finally we expect our deployment tooling

about this set of conventions combined
is that they support changes to either

configuration using the exact same

24 hours so once your PR has been

we know the github going down can have a

of productivity is lost so after looking

we added another step to our production

to help you confirm that it doesn't you

flowing through the system to support
this canary workflow our deployment

and another selecting a label to be
modified during a canary deployment our

mark as a canary sets the value of the

in a normal state of operation the

service equals unicorn but during a

canary deployment is created from the
new version of code with an identical

since our service resource doesn't
include the role label in its selector
traffic goes to the canary pod at the
